weapon_description: A ceremonial blade forged by Sanhaj, the great high priest of the Masters of the Night-Wind. In tales of bygone days, Sanhaj could use this curved blade to perform rituals, blurring the boundary between the Night Kingdom and the present world.
weapon_skill_description: While characters are protected by a Shield, DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks is increased by 40%, and Normal and Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 16%.
